explanation: The stage direction 'Elle sert de la soupe dans l'assiette de Laurent et dans la sienne.' involves the character interacting with an object, specifically serving soup into plates. This falls under the category of 'object' because it describes an action where a character handles or manipulates an object, in this case, serving soup.
stgdir: Elle sert de la soupe dans l'assiette de Laurent et dans la sienne.
